sentences.sContent: Were you always fairly bright at school?
sentences.sCn: 你上学时一直挺聪明吧？

sentences.sContent: You've got to be fairly single-minded about it.
sentences.sCn: 你必须对此事专心一些。

words.tran: 公平的；美丽的，白皙的；[气象] 晴朗的

trans.tranCn: 公正地； 正当地； 尚可， 还
trans.tranOther: You use fairly instead of "very" to add emphasis to an adjective or adverb without making it sound too forceful
